Deprecated API

Contents
  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
Deprecated Classes
org.yaml.snakeyaml.Dumper
          Dumper's functionality was moved to Yaml 
org.yaml.snakeyaml.JavaBeanParser
          use JavaBeanLoader instead 
org.yaml.snakeyaml.Loader
          Loader's functionality was moved to Yaml 
 

Deprecated Methods
org.yaml.snakeyaml.Yaml.addImplicitResolver(String, Pattern, String)
          use Tag instead of String 
org.yaml.snakeyaml.DumperOptions.setExplicitRoot(String)
          use Tag instead of String 
 

Deprecated Constructors
org.yaml.snakeyaml.resolver.Resolver(boolean)
          override addImplicitResolvers instead 
org.yaml.snakeyaml.Yaml(Loader)
          use with Constructor instead of Loader 
org.yaml.snakeyaml.Yaml(Loader, Dumper)
          use with Constructor instead of Loader 
org.yaml.snakeyaml.Yaml(Loader, Dumper, Resolver)
          use with Constructor instead of Loader
